channel.title: Xbox Live
channel.description:
Right, I got xbox 360, I bought an xbox 360 live pack thing, but I don't have an adsl or cable modem...I have a usb intranets thing....HOW THE FUCK DO I CONNECT IT TO MY XBOX 360 AND MAKE IT CONNECT OFF THAT?
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/7347/picture1nm8.jpg[/img][/URL]<--My internet [img]http://imshopping.rediff.com/pixs/productsearch/product_images/gaming_consoles/Microsoft_Xbox%20360.jpg[/img]<--Xbox 360 How do I make my internet work on my xbox?

item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

someone fkn add me
Yz85Racer

item.title: Xbox Live
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:14, topic:167057”][quote author=OWNER 2007 link=topic=226424.msg1950771#msg1950771 date=1198501671]

buy a ethernet cable…

also i think paying for live is freaking retarded. get a ps3 and play online for free.

Get XBL and enjoy a REAL live experience.

ok ill pay 50 bucks so i can play some shit games yay!
[/quote]Halo 3 aint shit, J00 I5 T3H SHI4T

i would rather play halo combat evolved then halo 3. halo 1 > halo 3[/quote]
Have you even played Halo 3?
Sure, Halo 1 is excellent… but the differences between the two (except for that stupid cortana level in Halo 3) make the experience much more enjoyable.

Halo 3 has much more interaction and AI with the characters, great graphics and a lot of new weapons and vehicles.
Anyway, he got it working.

So…
Something on-topic…
Xbox Live ftw.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox Live
item.dc:creator: @llib llib
item.description:
@llib wrote:

[quote=“frost21, post:26, topic:167057”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=226424.msg1995057#msg1995057 date=1200274926]
frost21, have you even seen the PS3 exclusives for this year? This year, PS3 > Xbox. I bet my soul.
[/quote]

Like which?I dont follow anything related to ps3 that much.[/quote][quote=“ThugLife, post:25, topic:167057”]Anyway… this is not a topic about whats better, take it to that one in discussions and debates.[/quote][quote=“Mr.Chris, post:24, topic:167057”]frost21, have you even seen the PS3 exclusives for this year? This year, PS3 > Xbox. I bet my soul.[/quote][quote=“ThugLife, post:22, topic:167057”][quote author=frost21 link=topic=226424.msg1993552#msg1993552 date=1200206930]
Ps3 only has a few real games to look forward too,Final fantasy.
[/quote]
Naw, if you look on the playstation store, there is LOADS of games coming out that look fucking amazing. But at the moment, i agree xbox 360 has the better online service, i probably would pay for it.[/quote][quote=“xxlegitxx, post:21, topic:167057”][quote author=frost21 link=topic=226424.msg1993552#msg1993552 date=1200206930]
X-box 360 online experience is much better.
[/quote][quote author=frost21 link=topic=226424.msg1993552#msg1993552 date=1200206930]
Ps3 only has a few real games to look forward too,Final fantasy.

X-box 360 online experience is much better.
[/quote]

Indeed. You get what you pay for.[/quote]

[size=15pt]ANYWAY GETTING BACK ON TOPIC[/size]

I have my Xbox (not a 360) hooked up to my comp with a crossover cable then I set up a Network between the two. (or “Fuckery”) Look at my Xbox Live tut on how to set up the Network.

Although if you have a router theres a different way, look here

Read full topic

item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Wont be worth the money at the end of 2008. PS3 has some fucking awesome updates this year, as well as games, that will tip the balance completely. Sony are expecting to start making a profit this year, after slashing unit production costs in half
